languages.text: "Соломон, обязательно было натравливать Глейто? И кроме насилия есть способы разобраться с нарушителями!"
"Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"
languages.original_text: "Соломон, обязательно было натравливать Глейто? И кроме насилия есть способы разобраться с нарушителями!"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"
"Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"
"Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"
"Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"
"Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"

languages.text: “索罗蒙，真的有必要叫格雷托对付他吗？对付罪犯的手段不仅仅只有暴力而已！”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙，真的有必要叫格雷托对付他吗？对付罪犯的手段不仅仅只有暴力而已！”

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、グライトをけしかける必要が本当にあったのか？犯罪者に対処する方法は、暴力以外にもあるはずだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、グライトをけしかける必要が本当にあったのか？犯罪者に対処する方法は、暴力以外にもあるはずだろう！」

languages.text: «Solomorne, ¿de verdad hacía falta echarle encima a Glaito? ¡La violencia no es la única manera de tratar con un criminal!».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, ¿de verdad hacía falta echarle encima a Glaito? ¡La violencia no es la única manera de tratar con un criminal!».

languages.text: "Glaito'yu illa üzerine salmak şart mı Solomorne? Şiddete başvurmadan da suçlularla mücadele edilebilir!"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'yu illa üzerine salmak şart mı Solomorne? Şiddete başvurmadan da suçlularla mücadele edilebilir!"

languages.text: « Était-il vraiment nécessaire de lâcher Glaito sur lui, Solomorne ? La violence n'est pas la seule façon de châtier les criminels ! »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"

traits.locale_text: « Était-il vraiment nécessaire de lâcher Glaito sur lui, Solomorne ? La violence n'est pas la seule façon de châtier les criminels ! »

languages.text: "Solomorne, war es wirklich nötig, Glaito auf ihn zu hetzen? Man kann Kriminellen auch anders begegnen als mit Gewalt!"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, was it wholly necessary to set Glaito on him? There are ways to deal with criminals besides violence!"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, war es wirklich nötig, Glaito auf ihn zu hetzen? Man kann Kriminellen auch anders begegnen als mit Gewalt!"
